definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: drag (Impf. consec. 1 s. [[ואסחב]] MI:18, sf. [[ואסחבה]] Ib:12.13; Ph. [[סחב]] Lzb:328; Ar. sah.aba, Eth. sah.aba:);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1 pl. [[וְסָחַ֫בְנוּ]] consec. 2Sa 17:13; Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יִסְחָבוּם]] Je 49:20, Je 50:45; Inf. abs. [[סָחוֹב]] Je 22:19; cstr. [[לִסְחׂב]] Je 15:3; —drag, a city [[עַד־הַנַּחַל]] 2Sa 17:13, corpses Je 15:3, Je 22:19, captives, under fig. of sheep dragged off by wild beast Je 49:20 = Je 50:45 (LXX pass., whence Schwally Gie suppose a
